body_html: And I don't think there is anything we can do to remain deterministic when resuming after crash. You either have to dump the RNG state after the crash, or do all the random generation for previous steps again.
body_text: And I don't think there is anything we can do to remain deterministic when resuming after crash. You either have to dump the RNG state after the crash, or do all the random generation for previous steps again.
body: And I don't think there is anything we can do to remain deterministic when resuming after crash. You either have to dump the RNG state after the crash, or do all the random generation for previous steps again.
